dict.acceptation: 非凡的，特别的；意外的，离奇的；临时的，特派的；不寻常；

sent.orig: All the extraordinary men I have ever known were chiefly extraordinary in their own estimation.
sent.trans: 迄今我所认识的所有非凡人物，主要都是些自命不凡者罢了。

sent.orig: All the extraordinary men I have ever known are chiefly extraordinary in their own estimation.
sent.trans: 迄今我所认识的所有非凡人物，主要是些自命不凡者罢了。

sent.orig: See Extraordinary: Sky Blue FC's Natasha Kai exhibits extraordinary energy and flair.
sent.trans: 看到不寻常的：天蓝色FC的娜塔莎启展品过人的精力和才华。

sent.orig: Thanks to your extraordinary clumsiness, I shall have to buy a whole set tea service.
sent.trans: 因为你笨手笨脚，我不得不去买一整套茶具。

sent.orig: Such a small thatched house even has so extraordinary a history.
sent.trans: 这样一间小草屋原来还有那么一段不平凡的历史。
